attributes.action: make games and consoles come out in the united kingdom before america
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like games and games consoles to come out in the united kingdom before they come out in america because we are more superior to america and deserve to have our games and games consoles first

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
